name: The Forest Hero
description:
The Forest Hero is a top-down adventure game that takes place in the land of Labrinna. You play as the character Rynder, who wakes up in Greenwood Town, the once bustling center of Labrinna. Team up with Rynder and his Frog friend as you solve puzzle and fight enemies to take back Labrinna from the King of Evil, Ambrog!

The web controls are:

WASD for movement

X for the A Button

Z for the B Button

Enter for the START Button

Right Shift for the SELECT  Button
